trans-unit.source: Provides colors used for Microsoft Office display elements.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于 Microsoft Office 的颜色显示元素。

trans-unit.source: An instance of this class is called by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>.
trans-unit.target: 此类的实例称为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColorTable"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the starting color of the gradient used when the button is checked.
trans-unit.target: 获取按钮被选中时使用的渐变的开始颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the starting color of the gradient used when the button is checked.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>即按钮被选中时使用的渐变的起始颜色。

trans-unit.source: Gets the end color of the gradient used when the button is checked.
trans-unit.target: 获取按钮被选中时使用的渐变的结束颜色。

trans-unit.target: 获取渐变按钮被选中时使用的中间颜色。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，它是中间颜色按钮被选中时使用的渐变。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，它是稳定的颜色按钮被选中时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use <xref href="System.Drawing.SystemColors"></xref> rather than colors that match the current visual style.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否使用<xref href="System.Drawing.SystemColors"></xref>而不是匹配的当前的视觉样式的颜色。

trans-unit.source: If visual styles or themes are turned off, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> uses the colors in <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>.
trans-unit.target: 如果视觉样式或主题都被关闭，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>使用<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>中的颜色</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use <xref href="System.Drawing.SystemColors"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>to use <xref href="System.Drawing.SystemColors"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
